descriptionALittleAboutMe: I'm a software engineer, I love coding and I'm passionate about learning new technologies. I'm a Flutter Developer with 3+ years of experience in mobile app development. Proficient in crafting high-quality, user-centric applications that resonate with seamless experiences. Successfully collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver polished apps with pixel-perfect UI representations. Published application on app stores and completed many Freelance Tasks, showcasing expertise in Flutter, Dart, RESTful APIs, and UI/UX principles. A detail-oriented problem solver, skilled in optimizing performance and fostering strong teamwork in an Agile environment..
